resource.chars:
returning to London tomorrow when my 
address will be 174 Buckingham Palace Rd
S.W.
I shall be in London off and on next week 
but on the 26th I have to take 
my ship to sea 
I am sure you will acquit me of all 
desire to make trouble and know that 
I should not have appealed to you without 
serious reason 
believe me 
Yours sincerely 
R. Scott 
I was loathe to believe that there was 
animus in Mr Shaws attack (as it practically is)
but I’m afraid I cannot avoid this conclusion,
<s>both <\s> in reading both his preface and the suspiciously 
prompt review that appeared in the Times 
Supplement of Aug 13th but in attempting to 
find any reason for animus on Mr Shaw’s part 
I am utterly at a loss.
